Token.Abstract: AFURLSessionManager creates and manages an NSURLSession object based on a specified NSURLSessionConfiguration object, which conforms to <NSURLSessionTaskDelegate>, <NSURLSessionDataDelegate>, <NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate>, and <NSURLSessionDelegate>.
The managed session.
The managed session.
The managed session.
The operation queue on which delegate callbacks are run.
The operation queue on which delegate callbacks are run.
The operation queue on which delegate callbacks are run.

Responses sent from the server in data tasks created with dataTaskWithRequest:success:failure: and run using the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods are automatically validated and serialized by the response serializer. By default, this property is set to an instance of AFJSONResponseSerializer.

Responses sent from the server in data tasks created with dataTaskWithRequest:success:failure: and run using the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods are automatically validated and serialized by the response serializer. By default, this property is set to an instance of AFJSONResponseSerializer.

Responses sent from the server in data tasks created with dataTaskWithRequest:success:failure: and run using the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods are automatically validated and serialized by the response serializer. By default, this property is set to an instance of AFJSONResponseSerializer.
The security policy used by created request operations to evaluate server trust for secure connections. AFURLSessionManager uses the defaultPolicy unless otherwise specified.
The security policy used by created request operations to evaluate server trust for secure connections. AFURLSessionManager uses the defaultPolicy unless otherwise specified.
The security policy used by created request operations to evaluate server trust for secure connections. AFURLSessionManager uses the defaultPolicy unless otherwise specified.
The network reachability manager. AFURLSessionManager uses the sharedManager by default.
The network reachability manager. AFURLSessionManager uses the sharedManager by default.
The network reachability manager. AFURLSessionManager uses the sharedManager by default.
The data, upload, and download tasks currently run by the managed session.
The data, upload, and download tasks currently run by the managed session.
The data, upload, and download tasks currently run by the managed session.
The data tasks currently run by the managed session.
The data tasks currently run by the managed session.
The data tasks currently run by the managed session.
The upload tasks currently run by the managed session.
The upload tasks currently run by the managed session.
The upload tasks currently run by the managed session.
The download tasks currently run by the managed session.
The download tasks currently run by the managed session.
The download tasks currently run by the managed session.
The dispatch queue for completionBlock. If NULL (default), the main queue is used.
The dispatch queue for completionBlock. If NULL (default), the main queue is used.
The dispatch queue for completionBlock. If NULL (default), the main queue is used.
The dispatch group for completionBlock. If NULL (default), a private dispatch group is used.
The dispatch group for completionBlock. If NULL (default), a private dispatch group is used.
The dispatch group for completionBlock. If NULL (default), a private dispatch group is used.
Whether to attempt to retry creation of upload tasks for background sessions when initial call returns nil. NO by default.
Whether to attempt to retry creation of upload tasks for background sessions when initial call returns nil. NO by default.
Whether to attempt to retry creation of upload tasks for background sessions when initial call returns nil. NO by default.
Creates and returns a manager for a session created with the specified configuration. This is the designated initializer.

Parameter.Name: configuration
Parameter.Abstract: The configuration used to create the managed session.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A manager for a newly-created session.

Token.Abstract: Invalidates the managed session, optionally canceling pending tasks.

Parameter.Name: cancelPendingTasks
Parameter.Abstract: Whether or not to cancel pending tasks.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionDataTask with the specified request.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP request for the request.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the task finishes. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the server response, the response object created by that serializer, and the error that occurred, if any.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionUploadTask with the specified request for a local file.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP request for the request.

Parameter.Name: fileURL
Parameter.Abstract: A URL to the local file to be uploaded.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress object monitoring the current upload progress.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the task finishes. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the server response, the response object created by that serializer, and the error that occurred, if any.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionUploadTask with the specified request for an HTTP body.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP request for the request.

Parameter.Name: bodyData
Parameter.Abstract: A data object containing the HTTP body to be uploaded.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress object monitoring the current upload progress.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the task finishes. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the server response, the response object created by that serializer, and the error that occurred, if any.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionUploadTask with the specified streaming request.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP request for the request.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress object monitoring the current upload progress.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the task finishes. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the server response, the response object created by that serializer, and the error that occurred, if any.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionDownloadTask with the specified request.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP request for the request.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress object monitoring the current download progress.

Parameter.Name: destination
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed in order to determine the destination of the downloaded file. This block takes two arguments, the target path & the server response, and returns the desired file URL of the resulting download. The temporary file used during the download will be automatically deleted after being moved to the returned URL.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed when a task finishes. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the server response, the path of the downloaded file, and the error describing the network or parsing error that occurred, if any.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionDownloadTask with the specified resume data.

Parameter.Name: resumeData
Parameter.Abstract: The data used to resume downloading.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress object monitoring the current download progress.

Parameter.Name: destination
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed in order to determine the destination of the downloaded file. This block takes two arguments, the target path & the server response, and returns the desired file URL of the resulting download. The temporary file used during the download will be automatically deleted after being moved to the returned URL.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed when a task finishes. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the server response, the path of the downloaded file, and the error describing the network or parsing error that occurred, if any.

Token.Abstract: Returns the upload progress of the specified task.

Parameter.Name: uploadTask
Parameter.Abstract: The session upload task. Must not be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSProgress object reporting the upload progress of a task, or nil if the progress is unavailable.

Token.Abstract: Returns the download progress of the specified task.

Parameter.Name: downloadTask
Parameter.Abstract: The session download task. Must not be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSProgress object reporting the download progress of a task, or nil if the progress is unavailable.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when the managed session becomes invalid, as handled by the NSURLSessionDelegate method URLSession:didBecomeInvalidWithError:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the managed session becomes invalid. The block has no return value, and takes two arguments: the session, and the error related to the cause of invalidation.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a connection level authentication challenge has occurred, as handled by the NSURLSessionDelegate method URLSession:didReceiveChallenge:completionHandler:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a connection level authentication challenge has occurred. The block returns the disposition of the authentication challenge, and takes three arguments: the session, the authentication challenge, and a pointer to the credential that should be used to resolve the challenge.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a task requires a new request body stream to send to the remote server, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:needNewBodyStream:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a task requires a new request body stream.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when an HTTP request is attempting to perform a redirection to a different URL, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:willPerformHTTPRedirection:newRequest:completionHandler:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when an HTTP request is attempting to perform a redirection to a different URL. The block returns the request to be made for the redirection, and takes four arguments: the session, the task, the redirection response, and the request corresponding to the redirection response.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a session task has received a request specific authentication challenge, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:didReceiveChallenge:completionHandler:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a session task has received a request specific authentication challenge. The block returns the disposition of the authentication challenge, and takes four arguments: the session, the task, the authentication challenge, and a pointer to the credential that should be used to resolve the challenge.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed periodically to track upload progress, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:didSendBodyData:totalBytesSent:totalBytesExpectedToSend:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be called when an undetermined number of bytes have been uploaded to the server. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: the session, the task, the number of bytes written since the last time the upload progress block was called, the total bytes written, and the total bytes expected to be written during the request, as initially determined by the length of the HTTP body. This block may be called multiple times, and will execute on the main thread.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed as the last message related to a specific task, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:didCompleteWithError:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a session task is completed. The block has no return value, and takes three arguments: the session, the task, and any error that occurred in the process of executing the task.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a data task has received a response, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:didReceiveResponse:completionHandler:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a data task has received a response. The block returns the disposition of the session response, and takes three arguments: the session, the data task, and the received response.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a data task has become a download task, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:didBecomeDownloadTask:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a data task has become a download task. The block has no return value, and takes three arguments: the session, the data task, and the download task it has become.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a data task receives data, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:didReceiveData:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be called when an undetermined number of bytes have been downloaded from the server. This block has no return value and takes three arguments: the session, the data task, and the data received. This block may be called multiple times, and will execute on the session manager operation queue.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed to determine the caching behavior of a data task, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:willCacheResponse:completionHandler:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed to determine the caching behavior of a data task. The block returns the response to cache, and takes three arguments: the session, the data task, and the proposed cached URL response.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed once all messages enqueued for a session have been delivered, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSessionDidFinishEventsForBackgroundURLSession:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed once all messages enqueued for a session have been delivered. The block has no return value and takes a single argument: the session.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a download task has completed a download, as handled by the NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate method URLSession:downloadTask:didFinishDownloadingToURL:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a download task has completed. The block returns the URL the download should be moved to, and takes three arguments: the session, the download task, and the temporary location of the downloaded file. If the file manager encounters an error while attempting to move the temporary file to the destination, an AFURLSessionDownloadTaskDidFailToMoveFileNotification will be posted, with the download task as its object, and the user info of the error.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed periodically to track download progress, as handled by the NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate method URLSession:downloadTask:didWriteData:totalBytesWritten:totalBytesWritten:totalBytesExpectedToWrite:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be called when an undetermined number of bytes have been downloaded from the server. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: the session, the download task, the number of bytes read since the last time the download progress block was called, the total bytes read, and the total bytes expected to be read during the request, as initially determined by the expected content size of the NSHTTPURLResponse object. This block may be called multiple times, and will execute on the session manager operation queue.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a download task has been resumed, as handled by the NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate method URLSession:downloadTask:didResumeAtOffset:expectedTotalBytes:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when a download task has been resumed. The block has no return value and takes four arguments: the session, the download task, the file offset of the resumed download, and the total number of bytes expected to be downloaded.
